summary: 2010 INDIAN MOTORCYCLE.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO BODY CONTROL MODULE (BCM) RECALL NOTICE.  *SMD  THE CONSUMER STATED THE BIKE HAS BEEN THE SOURCE OF CONSTANT PROBLEMS, MOSTLY ELECTRICAL.  THE CONSUMER STATED THE RECALL FOR THE BCM, MADE THE BIKE WORSE. THE CONSUMER STATED HE HAS BEEN WITHOUT HIS BIKE SINCE AUGUST 2012. ALSO, THE BIKE WOULD NOT RE-START AFTER COMING TO A STOP. THE CONSUMER BELIEVED IT WAS A STARTER PROBLEM.
